h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones
content: Once you hand it over, the Man-in-Stone will burst out of the ground and declare you gullible for just giving it to him. That’s not very nice, and it sounds like he deserves a beatdown.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Mother of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Once you hand it over, the Man-in-Stone will burst out of the ground and declare you gullible for just giving it to him. That’s not very nice, and it sounds like he deserves a beatdown.
